title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 59.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 59.1 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) As used in this

Subchapter, license shall mean a permanent authorization, issued pursuant to
title VIII of the Education Law, to practice a profession or to use a
professional title. (b) The
provisions of this Part shall apply to admission to the licensing examination
and to the issuance of licenses in each of the professions supervised by the

Board of Regents except as may otherwise be provided in this Subchapter with
respect to specific professions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
59.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
